control.description-key: Date-based navigation and filtering for Event grids with multi-month calendar display. Supports event indicators with counts.

property.name: filterOutput
property.description-key: JSON filter output sent to grid (type, date range)

property.name: eventDatesJson
property.description-key: JSON array of dates with events and optional counts

property.name: displayMode
property.description-key: Calendar display mode: month (single) or multiMonth (vertical stack)

property.name: selectedDateOutput
property.description-key: Currently selected date for bi-directional sync
